uielement.SimpleUIElement

uielement.SimpleUIElement Class Reference

This class is a simple UIElement that can be configured at instantiation to respond to a specific input event and take some action. More...

Public Attributes

 eventType

 Function to execute to determine if action should be taken.
 eventAction
 Function to execute as the action.

Detailed Description

This class is a simple UIElement that can be configured at instantiation to respond to a specific input event and take some action.

Member Data Documentation

uielement.SimpleUIElement.eventAction

Function to execute as the action.

Accepts no arguments.

uielement.SimpleUIElement.eventCondition

Function to execute to determine if action should be taken.

Accepts as input the appropriate argument for the event type reacted to, returns a boolean.

uielement.SimpleUIElement.eventType

String, indicating what type of action to react to: keyDown, keyUp, mouseMove, mouseDown, mouseUp, processEvents.
